changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Unique identifier classification bigint NOT NULL, -- In conjunction with the 'status_code' column, determines the classification criteria for selecting attributes a certain status_code must have classifier bigint NOT NULL, -- In conjunction with the 'classification' column, determines the classification criteria for selecting attributes a certain status_code must have authorized_attribute bigint NOT NULL, -- An Attribute a status_code is expected to have sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, -- Ordering and uniqueness, for when an Attribute can have multiple acceptable values text_value character varying, -- Contains a single acceptable text-value if 'attribute' has a data type of 'text' integer_value integer, -- Contains a single acceptable integer-value if 'attribute' has a data type of 'integer' numeric_value numeric, -- Contains a single acceptable numeric-value if 'attribute' has a data type of 'numeric' timestamp_value timestamp with time zone, grouping_agency bigint, -- If present, used to select an entire grouping of status_codes that can be acceptable values notes character varying, -- Additional notes regarding this rule updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The status_code that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The date this rule was last changed CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_authorization_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_authorization_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (authorized_attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_authorization_classification_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (classification) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_authorization_classifier_fkey FOREIGN KEY (classifier) REFERENCES ruleform.status_code (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_authorization_grouping_status_code_fkey FOREIGN KEY (grouping_agency) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_authorization_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT status_code_attribute_authorizat_classification_attribute_clas_key UNIQUE (classification , classifier , authorized_attribute , sequence_number ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization IS 'Defines rules stating what attributes (and values thereof) are authorized for particular status_codes'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization.id IS 'Unique identifier'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization.classification IS 'In conjunction with the ''status_code'' column, determines the classification criteria for selecting attributes a certain status_code must have'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization.classifier IS 'In conjunction with the ''classification'' column, determines the classification criteria for selecting attributes a certain status_code must have'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization.authorized_attribute IS 'An Attribute a status_code is expected to have'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization.sequence_number IS 'Ordering and uniqueness, for when an Attribute can have multiple acceptable values'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization.text_value IS 'Contains a single acceptable text-value if ''attribute'' has a data type of ''text'''; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization.notes IS 'Additional notes regarding this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization.updated_by IS 'The status_code that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.status_code_attribute_authorization.update_date IS 'The date this rule was last changed';
